name: Saints and Sinners
description:
With Saints and Sinners give a life to Sinner in Dark Medieval Era or join the Saints to find Sinner among them and execute him in front of others. With your 4-8 friends or other players use in-game chat or voice chat to find who is Sinner or prove that you are not a Sinner! In this multiplayer thriller themed game all lies and slanders are free.



  • With completing all tasks, perform the rituel and find who is Sinner.
  • Follow the Sinner's traces using Magic Globe without him knowing it.
  • Team up with other Saints against the Sinner's blackout and lockdown abilities.
  • Start votings to execute the one whom you have doubts about and convince the other Saints in this way.
  • And the most important is Stay ALIVE!.



  • Kill all Saints before they detect you.
  • Give Saints a silent and hidden dead using Silent Step and Vision abilities.
  • With blackout and lockdown abilities ambush Saints.
  • Mingle with Saints by pretending you are completing the tasks.
  • Blame others in voting sessions to get rid of executions.
